title: All-Star Game Exposes Revenue Crunch, NFL Makes History
itunes:title: All-Star Game Exposes Revenue Crunch, NFL Makes History
description:
The NBA All-Star Game carried on this past weekend, despite push back from some top players. Jason, Barr, and Lynch discuss the economics of the star-studded event, amid opposition from some athletes. Meanwhile, it's International Women's Day, and Maia Chaka has made history as the first Black woman ever named to the NFL's officiating staff. Plus, there's a new platform elevating women's voices. World Cup champion Alex Morgan has teamed up with a bevy of decorated athletes to form TOGETHXR, a media and commerce company.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
